00010 #include "custom/accessor_member.h"
00011 #include "member_impl.h"
00012 #include "types/function_type.h"
00013 
00014 namespace reflection
00015 {
00016 
00018 
00019         class accessor_member::accessor_impl : public member::member_impl
00020         {
00021         public:
00022                 accessor_impl(
00023                         const char* name, 
00024                         void* delegGet, function_type* typeGet, 
00025                         void* delegSet, function_type* typeSet)
00026                         : member_impl(MEMBER_ACCESSOR, name)
00027                         , m_typeGet(typeGet)
00028                         , m_typeSet(typeSet)
00029                 {
00030                         memcpy(m_delegGetBuf, delegGet, sizeof(m_delegGetBuf));
00031                         if(m_typeSet)
00032                                 memcpy(m_delegSetBuf, delegSet, sizeof(m_delegSetBuf));
00033                 }
00034 
00035                 accessor_impl(const accessor_impl& other)
00036                         : member_impl(MEMBER_ACCESSOR, other.get_name())
00037                         , m_typeGet(other.m_typeGet)
00038                         , m_typeSet(other.m_typeSet)
00039                 {
00040                         memcpy(m_delegGetBuf, other.m_delegGetBuf, sizeof(m_delegGetBuf));
00041                         if(m_typeSet)
00042                                 memcpy(m_delegSetBuf, other.m_delegSetBuf, sizeof(m_delegSetBuf));
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 void get_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00046                 {
00047                         void* args[] = { &inst };
00048                         m_typeGet->invoke((void*)m_delegGetBuf, args, buffer);
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 void set_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00052                 {
00053                         if(m_typeSet)
00054                         {
00055                                 void* args[] = { &inst, buffer };
00056                                 m_typeSet->invoke((void*)m_delegSetBuf, args, 0);
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 bool is_read_only() const
00061                 {
00062                         return m_typeSet == 0;
00063                 }
00064 
00065                 type* value_type() const
00066                 {
00067                         return m_typeGet->return_type();
00068                 }
00069 
00070         private:
00071                 char m_delegGetBuf[member::_deleg_buf_size];
00072                 char m_delegSetBuf[member::_deleg_buf_size];
00073                 function_type* m_typeGet;
00074                 function_type* m_typeSet;
00075         };
00076 
00078         // accessor_member
00080 
00081         accessor_member::accessor_member(
00082                 const char* name, 
00083                 void* delegGet, 
00084                 function_type* typeGet, 
00085                 void* delegSet /* = 0 */, 
00086                 function_type* typeSet /* = 0 */)
00087                 : member(new accessor_impl(name, delegGet, typeGet, delegSet, typeSet))
00088         {
00089                 m_impl = static_cast<accessor_impl*>(member::m_impl);
00090         }
00091 
00093 
00094         accessor_member::accessor_member(accessor_impl* impl)
00095                 : member(impl)
00096         {
00097                 m_impl = impl;
00098         }
00099 
00101 
00102         void accessor_member::get_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00103         {
00104                 m_impl->get_value(inst, buffer);
00105         }
00106 
00108 
00109         void accessor_member::set_value(void* inst, void* buffer) const
00110         {
00111                 m_impl->set_value(inst, buffer);
00112         }

00116         bool accessor_member::is_read_only() const
00117         {
00118                 return m_impl->is_read_only();
00119         }

00122 
00123         type* accessor_member::value_type() const
00124         {

00130         accessor_member* accessor_member::clone() const
00131         {
00132                 return new accessor_member(new accessor_impl(*m_impl));
